mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jgv.charactor (ch_name, ch_job, ch_birth, ch_nation) VALUES (#{chName}, #{chJob}, #{chBirth}, #{chNation})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ch_name FROM jgv.charactor c INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc on c.ch_num = mc.ch_num WHERE mc.mo_num = #{monum} ORDER BY c.ch_num ASC

SELECT c_img_url FROM jgv.charactor_image INNER JOIN jgv.charactor c on charactor_image.ch_num = c.ch_num INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc on c.ch_num = mc.ch_num WHERE mc.mo_num = #{monum} UNION SELECT 'http://img.cgv.co.kr/R2014/images/common/default_230_260.gif' AS c_img_url ORDER BY c_img_url ASC;
